Posts.Content: Jun 8, 2014 11:29AM lisa84 wrote: Hello, I am new to the community. April 4th i was diagnosed with stage 3 inflammatory breast cancer. I have one lymphnode showing abnormalities. I am currently undergoing chemo and will be undergoing a masectomy in september. Followed by an elective masectomy down the road. Not sure exactly what to say. Hello everyone. Any information or help is greatly appreciated.
Posts.Title: A place to greet and meet newbies to stage III hopefour Castigame
